testcase.name: platform_tag_confiner_test.rb
testcase.system-out:
DSL::Structure::PlatformTagConfiner
* #platform_specific_tag_confines doesn't change hosts if there are no tags
* #platform_specific_tag_confines can remove hosts from a test, or be skipped if empty Tag 'tag1' found, confining: except platforms matching regex '(?-mix:el-7-x86_64)'. Reason: 'reason1' Warning: No suitable hosts without: {:platform=>/el-7-x86_64/}
No suitable hosts found without {:platform=>/el-7-x86_64/} Begin teardown End teardown

testcase.name: host_test.rb
testcase.system-out:
confirm host object behave correctly
* #port_open? : can determine if a port is open on hosts port 22 (ssh) should be open on m0u542w0on9dla2.delivery.puppetlabs.net port 65535 should be closed on m0u542w0on9dla2.delivery.puppetlabs.net port 22 (ssh) should be open on goo3bkxxqts971i.delivery.puppetlabs.net port 65535 should be closed on goo3bkxxqts971i.delivery.puppetlabs.net
* #ip : can determine the ip address on hosts
m0u542w0on9dla2.delivery.puppetlabs.net (redhat7-64-1) 19:08:48$ ip a | awk '/global/{print$2}' | cut -d/ -f1 | head -1 10.32.121.42

dsl::helpers::host_helpers #on
* #on raises an exception when remote command fails
m0u542w0on9dla2.delivery.puppetlabs.net (redhat7-64-1) 19:11:25$ /bin/nonexistent-command bash: /bin/nonexistent-command: No such file or directory
m0u542w0on9dla2.delivery.puppetlabs.net (redhat7-64-1) executed in 0.03 seconds Exited: 127
* #on makes command output available via `.stdout` on success
m0u542w0on9dla2.delivery.puppetlabs.net (redhat7-64-1) 19:11:25$ echo "echo via on" echo via on
m0u542w0on9dla2.delivery.puppetlabs.net (redhat7-64-1) executed in 0.03 seconds
* #on makes command error output available via `.stderr` on success
m0u542w0on9dla2.delivery.puppetlabs.net (redhat7-64-1) 19:11:25$ /bin/nonexistent-command bash: /bin/nonexistent-command: No such file or directory
m0u542w0on9dla2.delivery.puppetlabs.net (redhat7-64-1) executed in 0.03 seconds Exited: 127
* #on makes exit status available via `.exit_code`
m0u542w0on9dla2.delivery.puppetlabs.net (redhat7-64-1) 19:11:25$ echo "echo via on" echo via on
m0u542w0on9dla2.delivery.puppetlabs.net (redhat7-64-1) executed in 0.03 seconds
* #on with :acceptable_exit_codes will not fail for named exit codes

testcase.name: shell_test.rb
testcase.system-out:
dsl::helpers::host_helpers #shell
* #shell raises an exception when remote command fails
m0u542w0on9dla2.delivery.puppetlabs.net (redhat7-64-1) 19:11:44$ /bin/nonexistent-command bash: /bin/nonexistent-command: No such file or directory
m0u542w0on9dla2.delivery.puppetlabs.net (redhat7-64-1) executed in 0.03 seconds Exited: 127
* #shell makes command output available via `.stdout` on success
m0u542w0on9dla2.delivery.puppetlabs.net (redhat7-64-1) 19:11:44$ echo "echo via on" echo via on
m0u542w0on9dla2.delivery.puppetlabs.net (redhat7-64-1) executed in 0.03 seconds
* #shell makes command error output available via `.stderr` on success
m0u542w0on9dla2.delivery.puppetlabs.net (redhat7-64-1) 19:11:44$ /bin/nonexistent-command bash: /bin/nonexistent-command: No such file or directory
m0u542w0on9dla2.delivery.puppetlabs.net (redhat7-64-1) executed in 0.03 seconds Exited: 127
* #shell makes exit status available via `.exit_code`
m0u542w0on9dla2.delivery.puppetlabs.net (redhat7-64-1) 19:11:44$ echo "echo via on" echo via on
m0u542w0on9dla2.delivery.puppetlabs.net (redhat7-64-1) executed in 0.03 seconds
* #shell with :acceptable_exit_codes will not fail for named exit codes
m0u542w0on9dla2.delivery.puppetlabs.net (redhat7-64-1) 19:11:44$ /bin/nonexistent-command bash: /bin/nonexistent-command: No such file or directory
m0u542w0on9dla2.delivery.puppetlabs.net (redhat7-64-1) executed in 0.03 seconds Exited: 127
* #shell with :acceptable_exit_codes will fail for other exit codes
m0u542w0on9dla2.delivery.puppetlabs.net (redhat7-64-1) 19:11:44$ echo "echo via on" echo via on
m0u542w0on9dla2.delivery.puppetlabs.net (redhat7-64-1) executed in 0.03 seconds
* #shell will pass :environment options to the remote host as ENV settings
m0u542w0on9dla2.delivery.puppetlabs.net (redhat7-64-1) 19:11:44$ env FOO="bar" env BEAKER9530B35B=BEAKER9530B35B XDG_SESSION_ID=7 SELINUX_ROLE_REQUESTED= SHELL=/bin/bash suf_BEAKER9530B35B=suf_BEAKER9530B35B SSH_CLIENT=10.32.128.39 59930 22 SELINUX_USE_CURRENT_RANGE= BEAKER668E39A8_p2=BEAKER668E39A8_v2 USER=root BEAKER21550B35_p1=BEAKER21550B35_v1 SSH_AUTH_SOCK=/tmp/ssh-8kSzontHNl/agent.2554 MAIL=/var/mail/root PATH=PATH:/opt/puppet/bin:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin PWD=/root BEAKERA95E0234_p1=BEAKERA95E0234_v1 LANG=en_US.UTF-8 BEAKERB3B59453_pre=in_BEAKERB3B59453_in:suf_BEAKERB3B59453:BEAKERB3B59453_pre SELINUX_LEVEL_REQUESTED= p1_BEAKER668E39A8=v1_BEAKER668E39A8 SHLVL=1 HOME=/root BEAKER9530B35B_pre=BEAKER9530B35B_pre LOGNAME=root SSH_CONNECTION=10.32.128.39 59930 10.32.121.42 22 LESSOPEN=||/usr/bin/lesspipe.sh %s XDG_RUNTIME_DIR=/run/user/0 _=/usr/bin/env FOO=bar
m0u542w0on9dla2.delivery.puppetlabs.net (redhat7-64-1) executed in 0.05 seconds
* #shell allows assertions to be used in the optional block
m0u542w0on9dla2.delivery.puppetlabs.net (redhat7-64-1) 19:11:45$ echo "${RANDOM}:${RANDOM}" 16621:5718
m0u542w0on9dla2.delivery.puppetlabs.net (redhat7-64-1) executed in 0.03 seconds Begin teardown End teardown
